actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to permit the revision of certain transportation control plans.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to authorize the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to approve revisions in State implementation plans which would suspend or eliminate provisions which curtail motor vehicle parking in urban areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to permit the revision of certain transportation control plans.
